Description:
Model
Brand: GIGABYTE
Model: Z790 EAGLE AX


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Celeron / Intel Core 12th Gen (LGA 1700) / Intel Core 13th Gen (LGA 1700) / Intel Core 14th Gen (LGA 1700) / Pentium Gold


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel Z790


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: DDR5 5600
Maximum Memory Supported: 192GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel
Memory Feature: Support for DDR5 7600(O.C.) /7400(O.C.) /7200(O.C.) /7000(O.C.) /6800(O.C.) /6600(O.C.) / 6400(O.C.) / 6200(O.C.) / 6000(O.C.) / 5800(O.C.) / 5600 / 5400 / 5200/ 4800/4400 MT/s memory modules
Support for ECC Un-buffered DIMM 1Rx8/2Rx8 memory modules (operate in non-ECC mode)
Support for non-ECC Un-buffered DIMM 1Rx8/2Rx8/1Rx16 memory modules
Support for Extreme Memory Profile (XMP) memory modules


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: CPU:
- 1 x PCI Express x16 slot, supporting PCIe 5.0 and running at x16 (PCIEX16)
* The PCIEX16 slot can only support a graphics card or an NVMe SSD. If only one graphics card is to be installed, be sure to install it in the PCIEX16 slot.
PCI Express 4.0 x16: Chipset:
- 1 x PCI Express x16 slot, supporting PCIe 4.0 and running at x4 (PCIEX4)
PCI Express 3.0 x16: Chipset:
- 1 x PCI Express x16 slot, supporting PCIe 3.0 and running at x1 (PCIEX1_4)
PCI Express x1: Chipset:
- 2 x PCI Express x1 slots, supporting PCIe 3.0 and running at x1 (PCIEX1_2, PCIEX1_3)


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: CPU:
- 1 x M.2 connector (Socket 3, M key, type 22110/2280 PCIe 4.0 x4/x2 SSD support) (M2A_CPU)
Chipset:
- 1 x M.2 connectors (Socket 3, M key, type 2280 PCIe 4.0 x4/x2 SSD support) (M2P_SB)
- 1 x M.2 connectors (Socket 3, M key, type 2280 SATA and PCIe 4.0 x4/x2 SSD support) (M2M_SB)
SATA RAID: RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5, and RAID 10 support for SATA storage devices
Additional RAID Controller: RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5, and RAID 10 support for NVMe SSD storage devices


Onboard Audio
Audio Channels: 7.1 Channels


Onboard LAN
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps
Wireless LAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 ax
Bluetooth: BLUETOOTH 5.3


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1 x PS/2 keyboard/mouse port
1 x USB Type-C port, with USB 3.2 Gen 2 support
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port (red)
4 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports
2 x USB 2.0/1.1 ports
2 x SMA antenna connectors (1T1R)
1 x HDMI port
1 x DisplayPort
1 x RJ-45 port
3 x audio jacks


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1 x USB Type-C header, with USB 3.2 Gen 1 support
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 header
2 x USB 2.0/1.1 headers
Other Connectors: 1 x CPU fan header
1 x CPU fan/water cooling pump header
3 x system fan headers
1 x system fan/water cooling pump header
2 x addressable LED strip headers
3 x M.2 Socket 3 connectors
4 x SATA 6Gb/s connectors
1 x front panel header
1 x front panel audio header
1 x S/PDIF Out header
2 x Thunderbolt add-in card connectors
1 x Trusted Platform Module header (For the GC-TPM2.0 SPI / GC-TPM2.0 SPI 2.0/GC-TPM2.0 SPI V2 module only)
1 x reset button
1 x Q-Flash Plus button
1 x reset jumper
1 x Clear CMOS jumper


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1 x 24-pin ATX main power connector
2 x 8-pin ATX 12V power connectors


Windows Compatibility
Windows 11: Supported


Features
Features: Support for GIGABYTE Control Center (GCC)
* Available applications in GCC may vary by motherboard model. Supported functions of each application may also vary depending on motherboard specifications.

Support for Q-Flash
Support for Q-Flash Plus
Support for Smart Backup
Label: Board Gigabyte Z790 Eagle AX
